mutation {
  updateStoryMetadata(
    id: "{{ .story_id }}"
    name: "mystory"
    keywords: ["key1", "key2"]
    teamID: "aura-001"
    productAreaID: "Mocked-001"
    teamkatalogenURL: "https://some.url"
  ) {
    id
    name
  }
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.updateStoryMetadata.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "updateStoryMetadata": {
        "name": "mystory"
    }
  }
}
